import Mathlib

open Matrix

theorem orthogonal_matrix_columns_orthonormal_basis (n : Nat) (A : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ‚Ñù)
  (h : A·µÄ * A = 1) :
  Orthonormal ‚Ñù (fun i => A.col i) ‚àß (Submodule.span ‚Ñù (Set.range (fun i => A.col i)) = ‚ä§) := by sorry

open Matrix

theorem orthogonal_matrix_columns_orthonormal_basis (n : Nat)
  [InnerProductSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù)]
  (A : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ‚Ñù)
  (h : A·µÄ * A = 1) :
  Orthonormal ‚Ñù (fun i => A.col i) ‚àß (Submodule.span ‚Ñù (Set.range (fun i => A.col i)) = ‚ä§) := by sorry
